entry.title: Book List
entry.content:
Book List

Here is a list of the books (based on Notion) that I have read. The information and my verdict, feeling, and excerpt are all documented. Your comments are also welcomed.

This is a preview of the list.

entry.title: Daily Documentary
entry.content:
Daily Documentary

This post is intended to record the facts that happened on the given day, regardless of the location, and were thought to be important or meaningful.

这个帖子旨在记录在特定日子里发生的、被认为是重要的或有意义的事实，不论地点。

Date formate: DD-MM-YYYY

2023

29-03-2023

  • 华东师范大学社巡

31-03-2023

  • 七宝中学第十六届狂欢节
